name: kafka双流innerjoin
sqlStatements:
CREATE TABLE `t_order1` (
  `order_id`  BIGINT,
  `msg_type`  VARCHAR,
  `order_time`  BIGINT
) WITH (
  'connector' = 'kafka-0.11',
  'topic' = 'source_order',
  'properties.bootstrap.servers' = '10.0.9.44:18108,10.0.9.45:18108',
  'properties.max.poll.records' = '5000',
  'properties.group.id' = 'frist',
  'format' = 'json',
  'json.ignore-parse-errors' = 'true',
  'scan.startup.mode' = 'latest-offset'
);

CREATE TABLE `t_product1` (
  `num_int`  BIGINT,
  `id`  BIGINT,
  `name1`  VARCHAR
) WITH (
  'connector' = 'kafka-0.11',
  'topic' = 'source_info',
  'properties.bootstrap.servers' = '10.0.9.44:18108,10.0.9.45:18108',
  'properties.max.poll.records' = '5000',
  'properties.group.id' = 'frist',
  'format' = 'json',
  'json.ignore-parse-errors' = 'true',
  'scan.startup.mode' = 'latest-offset'
);

CREATE TABLE `order_detail1` (
  `order_id`  BIGINT,
  `msg_type`  VARCHAR,
  `order_time`  BIGINT,
  `num_int`  BIGINT
) WITH (
  'connector' = 'kafka-0.11',
  'topic' = 'sink_info',
  'properties.bootstrap.servers' = '10.0.9.44:18108,10.0.9.45:18108',
  'properties.max.poll.records' = '5000',
  'properties.group.id' = 'frist',
  'format' = 'json',
  'json.ignore-parse-errors' = 'true',
  'scan.startup.mode' = 'latest-offset'
);

INSERT INTO `order_detail1`
(SELECT `a`.`order_id`, `a`.`msg_type`, `a`.`order_time`, `b`.`num_int`
FROM `t_order1` AS `a`
INNER JOIN `t_product1` AS `b` ON `a`.`order_id` = `b`.`num_int`
WHERE `a`.`order_id` IS NOT NULL);
